## Tutorials

[**Survival analysis in R**](survival_analysis_in_r_tutorial.html): A detailed tutorial on conducting survival analyses in R, including an introduction to the basics of survival analysis, landmark analyses and time-dependent covariates, competing risks, and a selection of advanced topics.

[**Creating websites in R**](rmarkdown_websites_tutorial.html): A basic introduction to creating simple websites in RMarkdown, using a website for my cats as an example. Note that this tutorial is most useful for a basic guide to hosting a website on Github, and is out of date on the newest available software like distill, Quarto, and others.
